attributes.long-description:
DARE YOU ENTER THE CITY OF THE DEAD?
Run-and-gun through the zombie apocalypse as hit arcade shooter Dead Nation™ shuffles onto PlayStation®4.

Fight for your life alone or with a friend as Jack McReady or Scarlett Blake as you step onto the streets of a city overrunwith undead flesh-eaters.

And, if you’re feeling really brave, take a walk down the Road of Devastation – a deadly experiment that pushes your survival skills to the absolute limit as you face hordes of zombies with no extra lives and no second chances.

The dead may walk – but you can make sure they don’t walk very far.

USE YOUR DELICIOUS BRAAAINNSS
• Buy, unlock and upgrade potent weapons and life-saving armor.
• Devise cunning tactics to outsmart your rotting enemies.
• Face the horror alone or with a buddy in two-player action offline or online.
• Monitor the online infection map and news ticker for live updates on the fight for survival across the world.

1-2 Players
DUALSHOCK®4 Vibration Function
Touch pad
HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080i, 1080p
Network Features
Network Players 2
Remote Play PS Vita

This item is being licensed or sublicensed to you by Sony Computer Entertainment America and is subject to the Network Terms of Service and User Agreement, this item’s use restrictions and other applicable terms located at www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not download this item. One-time license fee for play on purchasing account’s designated, primary PS4™ system and other PS4 systems when signed in with purchasing account.

©2014 Sony Computer Entertainment Europe. Developed by Housemarque Oy. Dead Nation is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment Europe.
